title: Executive Order-Rescinding Reservation of Lands for Mission Indians
content: It is hereby ordered that the following lands, situate in California, viz, township 10 south, range 1 east, sections 16 and 36, San Bernardino; township 7 south, range 2 east, section 36; township 14 south, range 2 east, section 36; township 11 south, range 3 east, section 36; township 9 south, range 2 west, north half of northeast quarter, section 33, being lands withdrawn from the public domain for the Mission Indians by President’s order of December 27, 1875; also the following: township 2 south, range 1 east, section 36; township 7 south, range 8 east, section 16, being lands withdrawn by President’s order of May 15, 1876, for the same purposes, be, and the same are hereby, restored to the public domain.
citation: Rutherford B. Hayes, Executive Order-Rescinding Reservation of Lands for Mission Indians Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371277
